entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 70%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 5:13 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
